projects.name: Online Learning Management System
projects.description: Developed a platform for delivering courses, quizzes, and educational content. Features include user authentication, course creation, enrollment management, lesson delivery, assessments, progress tracking, and discussion forums. It also uses two factor authentication.

projects.name: NLP BASED MULTIMODAL USER PREFERENCE EXTRACTION
projects.description: Engineered a sophisticated recommendation system integrated with the user interface, leading to a 30 percent uptick in personalized product suggestions and a 20 percent increase in conversion rates. Combined image recognition and natural language processing to recommend similar products based on user searches.

projects.name: Gold Mine
projects.description: Developed an AI-based project to determine the best path for miners while avoiding obstacles. It is a Artificial Intelligence based project.

projects.name: Voice Assistant
projects.description: Created a Python-based voice assistant capable of sending emails, opening YouTube, playing music, and performing various tasks through voice commands. It can also describe about any person by writing them into text through a range of 500 to 750 words.

projects.name: Fitness Tracker
projects.description: Designed a fitness tracker to provide diet recommendations based on user inputs like height, workload, and daily routine. Implemented using Java, MySQL, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.name: Library Management System
projects.description: Designed a system using C++ with two sections: user and admin. Admins can log in to check book inventory and manage book issuance, while students can check issued books and return dates.

experiences.description: Done an internship purpose for 3 months in a project in online mode.
